unnormalised: Okay, hakaa Quora post magaashe dilaa, ashe te translation:
normalised: Borem, mazi "ixtt," tika Priya mhonuya, tika thoddi problem asa. Ti Cloudnine Hospital-antli Doctor Mehra-gelea, ek gynecology specialistak, ani sogllem...interesting asa. Dis'ta Obstetrics ani Gynecology-achem jag 'the call' (tumkam khobor asa koslem!) yevchem mhunn raavon ravonchea poros chodd asa. Priya eka check-up-ak geli, ani doctor mhunno lagli, "Tumchem H-B level dha point panch grams per deciliter asa; ami iron supplements-acho vichar korunk zata." Priya, tika bhogos, tika dislem H-B mhunnche eka trendy nove handbag brand asat mhunn. Sigh.

unnormalised: Vishay: Mhonnlear, tumi mhakaa sangtaat *hem* ek bayel zaavpachem asa? (Ek ixttaa khatir vichartam...thoddem zoxem)
normalised: Magir doctor-in ultrasounds ani N-S-T-s ani vaitt kitem tari ji sci-fi movie-ant asli mhunn dista, punn ek bailechea bhitor nhoi, tanche vixim ulounk lagli. Distam ek routine ultrasound-ak rupee tin hazar kharch yetat clinic-ant, ani hachi survaat zata. Tannen pre-eclampsia ani gestational diabetes-chea vixim kitem tari sangllem, jem Mumbai-ant rush hour-achea vellar auto-rickshaw parallel park korchea poros bhienkarta mhunn dista. Tinnen "P-C-O-S" hacho acronym vaporlo jaise te eka ghora-gharacho sobhachirasa. Mazi ixtt bhienn zata.

unnormalised: Okay, mhaji “ixtt,” tikaa Priya mhonnuyaa, tikaa thoddem jivitachhem nodden asa. Tikaa Dr. Mehra koddlean vochpaak zata, Cloudnine Hospitalantlea gyno, ani sogllem…uchit asa. Distaa, Obstetrics ani Gynecology chem sonvsar 'the call' chi vatt pollovpaa porosui odhik asa (tumkaa khobor asa konnchem!). Priya uzraak check-upak gel’li, ani doc tikaa mhonnaa, "Tumchem Hb level 10.5 g/dL asa; ami iron supplements vichar korpak zai poddttolim.” Priya, tikaa dev bore korum, tinnem Hb mhonnlear ek trendy navin handbag brand mhonn chintlem. Ufff.
normalised: Ani appointments kitlem chodd asa! Doctor Mehra tika dar satodyeak disunk sodta twenty eighth weeks of pregnancy-chea uprant. Dar satodyeak? Ti tichea avoi-sangata kitlem vell korta tacho poros chodd! Aste asta tika hospital-antli receptionist tichea ghorkareaporos chodd khobor asteli mhunn tinnem munnilem. Childbirth class pamphlet-ache vixim kitem sanga naka. Tem eka Bollywood movie-aporos lamb asa ani tech conference-aporos acronyms-am asa. Konnem tari maddot dhadd (ani chocolate di).

unnormalised: Doc tanem ultrasound ani NSTs vixim uloppak suruvaat keli ani techim nnaam zoxem tem science-fiction cinemaachea vantteak melltaa, baylenchye bhitar nallant nhoi. Distaa, routine ultrasoundachem mull Rs. 3000 clinicant asa, ani hem fokot survatch asa. Tinnem pre-eclampsia ani gestational diabetes vixim ullekh kelo, tem Mumbaiant rush houravaellar ek auto-rickshaw parallel park korchea porosui bhayanak distaale. Tinnem “PCOS” hem sankshipt rupenn vapurle zoxem tem sadharan ghoraant vapartat! Mhoji ixtt pragtyek hypertventilate kortali.
normalised: Seriously mhunnllear, zaati zaun eka baillek jivonachem kasht mhunnche hem? Constant poking, prodding, ani medical jargon decode korchem? Mazi "ixtt" ardhi convince asa ki tim dusri bhas uloustat. Ti soglleach term-ak google korta-kitem mhunnche amniocentesis, anyway? Tem mhunnllear bhienn zaun eka fetal position-ant dhapunk ani kednaich ghor sodunk nhoi. Ani dista ki anond fukt pregnancy-chea sangata suru zata. Mhaka aikuk yeta postpartum dusri level-achi...adventure.

unnormalised: Ani pure *sankhya* appointments! Dr. Mehra tikaa pregnancyache 28 vhea haftaaporaant dor 2 haftaamni pollovpak magtaa. Dor *don* haftaamni? Tem tikaa aplea aavoi sangati porosui odhik vel mellttaa! Hea gatint, ti vinodni mhonn ek hospitalachem receptionist tikaa aplea ghorkaraa porosui odhik barem zannam zaatolem. Tumcho arambh koru naka childbirth classachem pamphlet vixinchem. Tem Bollywood cinemaa porosui lamb asa ani ek tech conference porosui odhik sankshipt rupenn asa. Konnem utaar divom (ani zait hem chocolate).
normalised: Anyway, he soglle Obstetrics ani Gynecology-achea jungle-ak navigate korchea khatir kosli tips asa? Vishesh zaun eka zannak "Pap smear" mhunnche ek novi fruit zaat asa mhunn dishta tankam? Mazi "ixtt" sasnnachee apkaari zata. Ani wine dhaddun zata. (Non-alcoholic, of course, kiteak, ya know, "ixtt".)

unnormalised: Gambhirtaayen mhonnlear, ek bayel mhunn vaddu zal’lear hea porim asa? Satat dukhovop, dhaklovop, ani vaiddki jarganchem uchhaar? Mhoji “ixtt” ardhach patyeun asa tim dusrech bhashent uloitaat. Tikaa he soglle termaache vichar zale- zoxem, ek amniocentesis *kitlem* asa, zachem kaaran khaan? Tum tumchea potaat bhartam ani gharaak kadich choddunk naka mhonn dispaak lagta. Ani distaa, hem aanand fokot pregnancyche suruvaate sanganti *suru* zaataa. Hanv aiktaan postpartum dusrem ek level asa…adventurachem.

Konnakui hea samgrea Obstetrics ani Gynecology ranantlean ttochchea khatir tips asat kai? Khaaskar eklaa zaunn konn “Pap smear” hem navin torechem fol mhonn chintat? Mhoji “ixtt” sadakalaa upkaar maanpaak laagtoli. Ani zait hem borf divcho. (Alcohol naxilea, karann zaunn, ya zannaat, “ixtt”.)
